title: A World Unmade
goal: Kaelen begins to comprehend the vast chasm of time that has passed and the diminished state of his once-proud order.

beats.summary: Lyra painstakingly explains the centuries that have elapsed, detailing the fall of empires and the slow, insidious decay of the world Kaelen once knew.
Kaelen experiences profound shock and a deep, aching grief as he grapples with the loss of his era and the disappearance of all he held dear.
Lyra guides Kaelen through the now-diminished Sage's Sanctum, a shadow of its former glory, its halls quieter, its libraries less vibrant.
Kaelen senses a pervasive, subtle corruption, a 'Shadow Blight' that Lyra describes as the reason for the Sages' decline and the world's creeping malaise.
The weight of the new reality settles upon Kaelen, a profound internal struggle between his ancient power and his devastating disorientation.
